entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:45 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 06:45 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
